review: This is a great product.  It works perfectly once you get your system to recognize it.  It had to be installed twice to work properly and be recognized in my network.  Once installed and mated to the system it provides excellent service.  Finally a product which works directly with a browser so that you can use your television like a monitor.  This product is so much easier to use than other web products I have used.  There is no additional purchases necessary or subscriptions to make the player work.  Thanks for a great product.  d

I am very satisfied with the product.
